pageTitle: Itinerary for Sunday, July 1, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Leamington, Ontario

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a community event hosted by Highbury Canco Corporation to celebrate Canada Day and will deliver remarks.

Highbury Canco Corporation
148 Erie Street South

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 9:45 a.m. and should present themselves to the media registration table on the corner of Erie and Morgan Street
    • A limited number of parking spots will be reserved for media at the parking lot on the corner of Erie and Morgan
    • A riser will be available for stills and tripods

Regina, Saskatchewan

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will celebrate Canada Day with Canadian steel workers.

EVRAZ Park and Pool 
100 Armour Road

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity only
    • Media should arrive no later than 2:45 p.m. at the EVRAZ Management Club via gate 1

Dawson City, Yukon

8:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend a Canada Day community barbeque.

Waterfront Park
Front Street 

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should arrive no later than 8:15 p.m. at the clock

Media appearances

11:28 a.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on CBC.

12:00 p.m. A brief interview with the Prime Minister will air on Radio-Canada.
